alert.note: Alert for Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 11:55AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...EASTERN ALLEGHENY...JEFFERSON...GREENE...ARMSTRONG... SOUTHEASTERN CLARION...WESTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON... INDIANA...WESTMORELAND...WETZEL...MARSHALL...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA AND MARION COUNTIES... At 1153 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers were located along a cold front extending from 6 miles southwest of Marienville to Kittanning to Paden City. Movement was east at 40 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be followed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Monroeville, McMurray, Greensburg, McKeesport, Indiana, Washington, Uniontown, and Jeannette. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.
